full_description:
1STPLAYER MT 240 Mothra ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler Black

The 1STPLAYER MT 240 Mothra ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler Black is a top-of-the-line cooling solution for your CPU. This cooler features ARGB water flow dynamic piping, which not only cools your CPU but also provides a stunning light show with its RGB lighting. The 14 exchange runner cooling row and 20mm cooling fins work together to provide superior cooling performance. The 2700 RPM ARGB fan with PWM ensures that your CPU stays cool even during intense gaming or heavy workloads. Additionally, the thermal grease used in this cooler has a high conductivity rating of >13.4W/M-K, which helps to transfer heat away from your CPU quickly and efficiently. The silent water pump operates at 2500RPM±10%, which means it won't disrupt your gaming or work sessions. The EPDM+IIR high-density water pipe is durable and helps to ensure a long lifespan for this cooler. Moreover, the precise leak-proof structure of the 1STPLAYER MT 240 Mothra ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler ensures that your CPU is protected from any leaks or spills.

title: 1STPLAYER TS2 240 THUNDERSTORM ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler
cat_seo_title: 1STPLAYER CPU Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy 1STPLAYER CPU Cooler at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest 1STPLAYER CPU Air Cooler & Liquid Cooler available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery in BD.
full_description:
1STPLAYER TS2 240 THUNDERSTORM ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler

The 1STPLAYER TS2 240 THUNDERSTORM ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler is a high-performance cooling solution designed to enhance the thermal management of your CPU. It features an advanced design with ARGB lighting, a high-density fin heat sink, and a temperature-controlled fan system, making it an ideal choice for gamers and PC enthusiasts seeking both aesthetic appeal and efficient cooling performance. The cooler is equipped with a pure copper endothermic block, ensuring excellent thermal conductivity and rapidly transferring heat away from the CPU. The TS2 240 supports 5v RGB synchronization with compatible motherboards, allowing users to customize the lighting effects on the pump head and cooling fans, thus enhancing the visual appeal of your system with dynamic and colorful lighting effects. A nine-bladed temperature-controlled fan that runs at 600–1800 RPM is part of the cooler. This fan's noise reduction technology guarantees silent operation even when operating with large loads. Its dynamic speed adjustment keeps noise levels and cooling effectiveness in check. Furthermore, the TS2 240's water pump has a lifespan of 40,000 hours and runs at 2500±10% RPM, guaranteeing dependable and durable performance for continuous cooling over time. The heat sink's high-density fin design increases surface area for more effective cooling, which enhances heat dissipation and improves the liquid cooler's overall performance. High-performance silicone grease, which is included with the cooler, helps to improve thermal conductivity between the CPU and the cooler, guaranteeing maximum heat transfer and ideal cooling effectiveness. With its ability to customize appearances and cutting-edge cooling technology, the 1STPLAYER TS2 240 THUNDERSTORM ARGB CPU Cooler is a great option for preserving CPU performance at its best and giving your system a stylish touch. Its strong build, effective cooling system, and eye-catching ARGB lighting make it appropriate for both casual users and die-hard gamers.

title: 1STPLAYER CC 240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler
cat_seo_title: 1STPLAYER CPU Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy 1STPLAYER CPU Cooler at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest 1STPLAYER CPU Air Cooler & Liquid Cooler available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery in BD.
full_description:
1STPLAYER CC 240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler

The 1STPLAYER CC 240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler delivers excellent cooling performance and stunning ARGB lighting. This 240mm CPU cooler comes with a pure copper endothermic block that transfers heat from the CPU to the liquid efficiently. The 1STPLAYER Liquid CPU Cooler also has a high-density sigmoidal pin radiator that dissipates heat through the air. Their high-performance silicone grease reduces thermal resistance and improves heat conduction. The 1STPLAYER CC 240mm CPU Cooler operates at 2000±10% RPM bearing water pump and has a lifespan of 40,000 hours. The pump head is equipped with a CPU core temperature display that shows the real-time temperature. The 1STPLAYER CC 240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler also has a Jaeger FDB silent fan with a low noise level and high airflow. The fan and the pump head support 5v RGB sync with the motherboard (ARGB) and display various colors and effects that match the motherboard's lighting. The 1STPLAYER CC 240 ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler has a vacuum-plated top cover that protects the pump head and adds a sleek and elegant look. It also has a thick finned cooling row that enhances cooling performance and durability. The 1STPLAYER 240mm CPU cooler has a multi-mode lighting control cable to switch between different lighting modes and colors with a simple button press.

1stplayer MT 240 Mothra ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler

1stplayer MT 240 Mothra is a White-colored ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler. The RGB water cooling tubes with crystal clarity and support for 5V RGB synchronization, together with the aRGB water block and aRGB cooling fan, create a synchronized light effect circulation system.  Using the rare high-speed cooling fan for cooling. The fixed-bearing water pumps up to 2500RPM have a stable start and low noise while taking into account the quiet and shockproof performance. The physical parameters of the boiling point: 150â„ƒ, freezing point: -20â„ƒ prevent the formation of flocculation after long-term use of the coolant, which will cause the cooling effect to drop and block the water channel. It supports Intel LGA 775/115x/1366/2011/2066 and AMD AM4/FM2/FM1/AM3/AM2/FM3 CPU sockets. The materials used in the head are Pure Aluminum Blocks. It comes with a Mirror Water Cooling with ARGB lighting effect(5V interface), the lighting effects such as breathing, color-by-color, etc. that come with the motherboard ARGB software can be fully displayed one by one. It features a 2400 Rpm Silent Water Pump. The fan speed is 2500 RPM Â± 10% with a Noise of less than 30dB. The Connector is 3Pin+ARGB with a Rated Voltage of 12V DC and a Rated Current of â‰¤0.30A. The Power Consumption is â‰¤3.6W with a 200 Watt CPU power at max. And in terms of silence tuned to the ideal value to meet the use of high-performance players. It also has Temperature Controlled 9 Blades Fan (600-1500RPM) with  Noise Reduction Feature. It supports 5v RGB Sync with Motherboard (ARGB) On Pump Head & Cooling Fan.1stplayer MT 240 Mothra ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler offers 2 year Warranty.

full_description:
1stplayer TS 360 Thunderstorm ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler

1stplayer TS 360 Thunderstorm is an ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler. It has Mirror Water Cooling with ARGB lighting effect(5V interface), the lighting effects such as breathing, color-by-color, etc. that come with the motherboard ARGB software can be fully displayed one by one. The fixed-bearing water pumps up to 2400RPM have a stable start and low noise while taking into account the quiet and shockproof performance. The thin waterway design forms high-density fins, which absorb lots of heat. Different from the traditional single waterway design of the pump, TS240 can form two waterways and cover the entire heat dissipation surface. The heat dissipation effect can reach 1 or 2 times the unidirectional effect.  The fixed-bearing water pumps up to 2400RPM have a stable start and low noise while taking into account the quiet and shockproof performance. It has a Pure Copper Endothermic Block. It comes with a Long Life Bearing Water Pump (2400Â±10%RPM)/40,000hrs. It also has Temperature Controlled 9 Blades Fan (600-1500RPM) with  Noise Reduction Feature. It supports 5v RGB Sync with Motherboard (ARGB) On Pump Head & Cooling Fan. It is compatible with Intel (LGA 2066/ 2011/ 1151/ 1150/ 1155/ 1156) & AMD (AM4/ AM3/ AM2/ FM2/ FM1).The 1STPLAYER TS 360 comes with a Mirror Water Cooling with ARGB lighting effect(5V interface), the lighting effects such as breathing, color-by-color, etc. that come with the motherboard ARGB software can be fully displayed one by one.1stplayer TS 360 Thunderstorm ARGB Liquid CPU Cooler offers 2-year warranty.
